channel.title: Explosive potions glitch
channel.description: there is an item called an explosive potion on my server and when random people log in to my server, they just die due to someone else dropping the potion maybe :confused: if anyone knows whats wrong plz tell me and sorry if its in wrong section but im pretty sure its not

item.title: Explosive potions glitch
item.dc:creator: @Gnarly3 Gnarly...
item.description:
@Gnarly3 wrote:

Them dieing has NOTHING to do with “explosive potion”
It something wrong with the initialize method, maybe there HP is not set before it checks if they are dead in process.

Find somthing like this

		for(int i = 0; i < 25; i++) {
			setSkillLevel(i, playerLevel[i], playerXP[i]);
		}

And move it RIGHT under,

public void initialize() {
